cause.description:
This is a support group to encourage, raise funds, and support what I believe is one of the greatest casues on this planet. Yes kids are starving, dogs are being abused, diseases are being spread, and yes people need to be aware about STD's and prevention of spreading them. But there is a greater cause. Yes Keeping Rob Drunk!
1. Supply a steady of Molson Products to Rob
2. Supply Vodka and Tequilla to Rob
3. Supply mixes like Orange Juice, Dacari, and Margherita's
cause.mission: To keep Rob in his finest Form, Drunk
cause.name: Keep Rob Drunk
